languages.text: {n}Обернувшись к Паскалю, Ульфар веско произносит:{/n} "Я ведаю, что ты — муж любопытства, но даже не заикайся о том, чтобы свершать таинство извлечения из тел моих братьев. Тебе — запрещено".

{n}Turning to Pasqal, Ulfar says in a grave voice,{/n} "I know that you are a man of curiosity, but do not even think about performing the sacrament of harvesting on my brothers' bodies. It is forbidden for you."
languages.original_text: {n}Обернувшись к Паскалю, Ульфар веско произносит:{/n} "Я ведаю, что ты — муж любопытства, но даже не заикайся о том, чтобы свершать таинство извлечения из тел моих братьев. Тебе — запрещено".

languages.text: {n}ウルファーはパスカルのほうへ振り返り、重々しい声で言う。{/n}「あんたは好奇心旺盛な奴だって知ってるが、俺の同胞たちの遺体には手をかけるな。あんたにその資格はない」
languages.original_text: {n}Turning to Pasqal, Ulfar says in a grave voice,{/n} "I know that you are a man of curiosity, but do not even think about performing the sacrament of harvesting on my brothers' bodies. It is forbidden for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーはパスカルのほうへ振り返り、重々しい声で言う。{/n}「あんたは好奇心旺盛な奴だって知ってるが、俺の同胞たちの遺体には手をかけるな。あんたにその資格はない」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法转向帕斯卡，以沉痛的声音开口道。{/n}“我知道你充满了好奇，但不要妄图切割我兄弟们的遗体。我决不会允许你这样做。”
languages.original_text: {n}Turning to Pasqal, Ulfar says in a grave voice,{/n} "I know that you are a man of curiosity, but do not even think about performing the sacrament of harvesting on my brothers' bodies. It is forbidden for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法转向帕斯卡，以沉痛的声音开口道。{/n}“我知道你充满了好奇，但不要妄图切割我兄弟们的遗体。我决不会允许你这样做。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Se tournant vers Pasqal, Ulfar déclare d'une voix grave :{/n} « Je sais que vous êtes animé par la curiosité, mais abandonnez toute idée d'accomplir le sacrement du prélèvement sur les corps de mes frères. Cela vous est interdit. »
languages.original_text: {n}Turning to Pasqal, Ulfar says in a grave voice,{/n} "I know that you are a man of curiosity, but do not even think about performing the sacrament of harvesting on my brothers' bodies. It is forbidden for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se tournant vers Pasqal, Ulfar déclare d'une voix grave :{/n} « Je sais que vous êtes animé par la curiosité, mais abandonnez toute idée d'accomplir le sacrement du prélèvement sur les corps de mes frères. Cela vous est interdit. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar se gira hacia Pasqal y le advierte en tono grave:{/n} «Sé que su curiosidad es grande, pero ni se le ocurra celebrar el sacramento de la extracción con los cuerpos de mis hermanos. Le está prohibido».
languages.original_text: {n}Turning to Pasqal, Ulfar says in a grave voice,{/n} "I know that you are a man of curiosity, but do not even think about performing the sacrament of harvesting on my brothers' bodies. It is forbidden for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar se gira hacia Pasqal y le advierte en tono grave:{/n} «Sé que su curiosidad es grande, pero ni se le ocurra celebrar el sacramento de la extracción con los cuerpos de mis hermanos. Le está prohibido».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar wendet sich Pasqal zu und sagt mit ernster Stimme:{/n} "Ich weiß, Ihr seid ein neugieriger Mann, doch denkt nicht einmal daran, das Sakrament der Ernte an den Leichen meiner Brüder durchzuführen. Es ist Euch verboten."
languages.original_text: {n}Turning to Pasqal, Ulfar says in a grave voice,{/n} "I know that you are a man of curiosity, but do not even think about performing the sacrament of harvesting on my brothers' bodies. It is forbidden for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar wendet sich Pasqal zu und sagt mit ernster Stimme:{/n} "Ich weiß, Ihr seid ein neugieriger Mann, doch denkt nicht einmal daran, das Sakrament der Ernte an den Leichen meiner Brüder durchzuführen. Es ist Euch verboten."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, Pasqal'a dönerek kasvetli bir ses tonuyla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Meraklı birisi olduğunu biliyorum ama kardeşlerimin bedeninde hasat ayini yapmayı aklından geçirme. Bunu sana yasaklıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Turning to Pasqal, Ulfar says in a grave voice,{/n} "I know that you are a man of curiosity, but do not even think about performing the sacrament of harvesting on my brothers' bodies. It is forbidden for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, Pasqal'a dönerek kasvetli bir ses tonuyla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Meraklı bir tip olduğunu biliyorum ama kardeşlerimin bedeninde hasat ayini yapmayı düşünme bile. Bunu sana yasaklıyorum."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
